title: Arrest made after teen is shot in the chest while getting a perm
content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. — An 18-year-old female is in the hospital after being shot in the chest.
Police say she was brought to the Regional Medical Center around 1 a.m. Friday by her mother.
Detectives later determined that the shooting happened in the 900 block of North Hollywood St. near Vollintine Ave.
According to her mother, the teen was getting a home perm in another room when she was shot.
A witness say a 17-year-old male pulled out a gun and pointed it at the girl and fired.
Another witness said the male had a handgun that he started waving it around when the gun went off.
That same witness said the shooter called him and said he was at home waiting for police.
Police have indicated the shooting may have been accidental.
He is charged with aggravated assault.
